g.text: stats registering a new SNS User
requests data (name, address, sex (optional), phone number, e-mail, birth date, SNS User number and citizen card number)
createSNSUser(name, address, sex, phone number, e-mail, birth date, SNS User number, citizen card number)
user = createSNSUser(name, address, sex, phone number, e-mail, birth date, SNS User number, citizen card number)
create(name, address, sex, phone number, e-mail, birth date, SNS User number, citizen card number)
shows all data and requests confirmation
